item.title: Leah and Joe were 17 and 18 when they were aboard the Smiler ride at Alton Towers that crashed on June 2, 2015, leaving them both with life changing injuries. Alton Tower's operator, Merlin, were fined £5m and compensation paid to 16 victims of the crash.
item.description: Leah and Joe were 17 and 18 when they were aboard the Smiler ride at Alton Towers that crashed on June 2, 2015, leaving them both with life changing injuries. Alton Tower's operator, Merlin, were fined £5m and compensation paid to 16 victims of the crash.
